closeVotingReturnWinner().details: Computes the winning proposal taking all previous votes into account.

getCurrentElectionResults().details: If there is not a live election it will show the candidated of the previous election

params.candidateAddresses: is array of addresses for the condidates

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote(uint256).details: Address must have registered to vote previously and not already voted

closeVoterRegistration().notice: Allows the owner of the contract to close voter registration

getCurrentElectionResults().notice: this will the candidate array with the current results

getUserVoterData().notice: Gets a user voter data for current or past election if there is no live election

openVotingRegistration(address[]).notice: This allows the owner to open registratin and supply an array of candidates

registerToVote().notice: This allows a user to register to vote

vote(uint256).notice: User can vote with the index of the canidate in the candidate array
